content: How do you set a reminder on a Zulip message?
I think we need to download a bot for that
That's a pretty necessary one to download. I am not sure how else to keep track of messages.

There's an open issue for it: https://github.com/zulip/zulip/issues/1739

Starring a message is suggested as workaround. A bot can't add to the context menu of a message afaik, so it'd be kinda inconvenient
Writing bots is rather easy, so one can implement this functionality quickly. But what it should do?
